title: I am a beginner , what's the best first book in math? - Quora

response.answer_text: This actually depends a lot on what you've covered already.Assuming that you have basic  knowledge of 9-10 Grade, you can start with   As a child, How to Solve It - by George Poya. http://www.scribd.com/doc/63954906/Functional-Equations-and-How-to-Solve-Them
